PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-02092022-03-03,  ,  ,  ,  HC
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectInterim Order No. 3 Respecting the Importation and Sale of Medical Devices for Use in Relation to COVID-19
PrecisOrder approving the INTERIM ORDER NO. 3 RESPECTING THE IMPORTATION AND SALE OF MEDICAL DEVICES FOR USE IN RELATION TO COVID-19, made by the Minister of Health on February 21, 2022 in order to continue providing an expedited pathway for authorizing importation and sale of COVID-19 medical devices.
AttachmentsAttachment
